verses.kjv: And in that day seven women shall take hold of one man, saying, We will eat our own bread, and wear our own apparel: only let us be called by thy name, to take away our reproach.
verses.ct: When that day comes, 7 women will grab onto one man and say, 'We'll provide our own food and our own clothing — just let us carry your name so we can escape our disgrace.'

verses.kjv: In that day shall the branch of the LORD be beautiful and glorious, and the fruit of the earth shall be excellent and comely for them that are escaped of Israel.
verses.ct: On that day, the branch of the LORD will be stunning and glorious, and what the land produces will be the pride and honor of Israel's survivors.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, that he that is left in Zion, and he that remaineth in Jerusalem, shall be called holy, even every one that is written among the living in Jerusalem:
verses.ct: Everyone who remains in Zion, everyone still living in Jerusalem — all who are recorded among the living in Jerusalem — will be called holy.

verses.kjv: When the Lord shall have washed away the filth of the daughters of Zion, and shall have purged the blood of Jerusalem from the midst thereof by the spirit of judgment, and by the spirit of burning.
verses.ct: This will happen after the Lord has cleansed the stain of Zion's daughters and scrubbed the bloodshed from Jerusalem through a spirit of judgment and a spirit of fire.

verses.kjv: And the LORD will create upon every dwelling place of mount Zion, and upon her assemblies, a cloud and smoke by day, and the shining of a flaming fire by night: for upon all the glory shall be a defence.
verses.ct: Then the LORD will create over every home on Mount Zion and over all its gatherings a cloud of smoke during the day and a glow of blazing fire at night, because over all the glory there will be a protective covering.

verses.kjv: And there shall be a tabernacle for a shadow in the day time from the heat, and for a place of refuge, and for a covert from storm and from rain.
verses.ct: There will be a shelter to provide shade from the daytime heat, and a refuge and hiding place from storms and rain.
